trans-unit.source: Specifies the location mode to indicate which location should receive the request.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the location mode to indicate which location should receive the request.

trans-unit.source: Requests are always sent to the primary location.
trans-unit.target: Requests are always sent to the primary location.

trans-unit.source: Requests are always sent to the primary location first.
trans-unit.target: Requests are always sent to the primary location first.

trans-unit.source: If a request fails, it is sent to the secondary location.
trans-unit.target: If a request fails, it is sent to the secondary location.

trans-unit.source: Requests are always sent to the secondary location.
trans-unit.target: Requests are always sent to the secondary location.

trans-unit.source: Requests are always sent to the secondary location first.
trans-unit.target: Requests are always sent to the secondary location first.

trans-unit.source: If a request fails, it is sent to the primary location.
trans-unit.target: If a request fails, it is sent to the primary location.
